message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item to you for $140. I believe it will be very valuable to you.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $130. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I understand your position, Bob, but I can't go as low as $130. Would you consider $135? It's a fair price for the value you're getting.
I'm still interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $125. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
